headline: A Look At Johnson Controls (JCI) Valuation After New Asia Pacific Leadership Appointment
summary: Johnson Controls International (JCI) has drawn investor attention after appointing Susan Hughes as president, Asia Pacific. She will report to CEO Joakim Weidemanis and join the executive committee, a move focused on execution in that region. See our latest analysis for Johnson Controls International. At a share price of $116.96, Johnson Controls International has a 1 day share price return of 1.64% and a 7 day share price return of 2.10%, while the 1 year total shareholder return of 56.00%...

headline: United States Chillers Forecast Report 2025: A $4.95 Billion Market by 2033 Featuring Mitsubishi, Daikin Industries, Dimplex, LG, Johnson Controls, Polyscience, Smardt, Thermax,Trane
summary: The United States Chillers Market is projected to grow from US$ 3.62 billion in 2025 to US$ 4.95 billion by 2033, at a CAGR of 3.98%. This growth is driven by rising industrialization, expanding commercial infrastructure, and increasing demand for energy-efficient cooling systems. Growth factors include advancements in technology like IoT and AI, which enhance efficiency and lower costs. States such as California, Texas, New York, and Florida lead in market demand.
